us.zoom.sdk

Interface InMeetingService


  • public interface InMeetingService
    Zoom in-meeting service. Note: All the interfaces must be called in meeting process

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long activeShareUserID()
      This method is used to get active share user id in the meeting.
      long activeVideoUserID()
      This method is used to get active video user id in the meeting.

      Register a listener for in-meeting event
      boolean askAttendeeStartVideo(long userId)
      This method is used for host to adk the user to start video

        Register a listener for in-meeting event

      • removeListener

        Unregister a listener
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener instance

      • isMeetingLocked

        boolean isMeetingLocked()
        This method is used to tell whether the meeting is locked by host or not.
        Returns:
        true, the meeting has been locked by host.

      • changeName

        boolean changeName(java.lang.String inputName,
                   long userId)
        This method is used to change user's display name in meeting.
        Parameters:
        inputName, - the display name which will be used in meeting.
        userId, - user's ID in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call success or not

      • isShareLocked

        boolean isShareLocked()
        This method is used to tell whether the screen share is locked by host or not.
        Returns:
        YES, the screen share has been locked by host.

      • getInMeetingUserList

        InMeetingUserList getInMeetingUserList()
        Note: Don't call this interface frequently. This method will return all the users in the meeting.
        Returns:
        InMeetingUserList object.

      • getMyUserID

        long getMyUserID()
        This method is used to get my user id in the meeting.
        Returns:
        my user id.

        This method is used to get my user info in the meeting.
        Returns:
        my user info, a InMeetingUserInfo object.

        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        user video is spotlighted or not

      • spotLightVideo

        boolean spotLightVideo(boolean on,
                       long userId)
        This method is used to spotlight the user's video or not.
        Parameters:
        on, - if true to spotlight user's video; if NO to cancel spotlight user's video.
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call success or not

      • makeHost

        boolean makeHost(long userId)
        This method is used to assign host role to another user in the meeting.
        Parameters:
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call success or not *Note*: the user should not be myself, and can assign the host role .

        Api call success or not

        Returns:

      • muteAttendeeAudio

        boolean muteAttendeeAudio(boolean isMute,
                          long userId)
        This method is used for host to mute/umute the user's audio.
        Parameters:
        isMute, - if true to mute user's audio; if NO to umute user's audio.
        userId, - the user id in meeting.
        Returns:
        Api call success or not

      • muteAllAttendeeAudio

        boolean muteAllAttendeeAudio(boolean allowUnmuteSelf)
        This method is used for host to mute all atteedees' audio.
        Parameters:
        allowUnmuteSelf, - if allow attendee ummute audio by themselves
        Returns:
        Api call success or not

      • handleE2EMeetingExternalSessionKeyReady

        boolean handleE2EMeetingExternalSessionKeyReady(java.util.Map<EnumComponentType,com.zipow.videobox.util.E2EMeetingExternalSessionKey> params,
                                                boolean isLeaveMeeting)
        This method is used to set customized meeting session key.
        Parameters:
        params - the map of meeting session keys
        isLeaveMeeting - YES means leave meeting directly; NO means not leave meeting
        Returns:
        Api call success or no

      • isExternalMeeting

        Returns:

        Returns:
        true if current meeting is a failover meeting

      • querySessionNetworkStatus

        int querySessionNetworkStatus(EnumComponentType type,
                              boolean bSending)
        This method is used to check current meeting session network status
        Parameters:
        type - component type defined in EnumComponentType class Note: only can get AS/VIDEO/AUDIO
        bSending - YES means getting data sending status; NO means receiving status
        Returns:
        quality level defined in SessionNetQualityLevel class
